com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing

Interface IndexProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IndexInformation

    public interface IndexProvider
extends IndexInformation
    External index for querying. An index can contain an arbitrary number of index stores which are updated and queried separately.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransactionHandle beginTransaction()
      Returns a transaction handle for a new index transaction.
      void clearStorage()
      Clears the index and removes all entries in all stores.
      void close()
      Closes the index
      void mutate(Map<String,Map<String,IndexMutation>> mutations, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever informations, TransactionHandle tx)
      Mutates the index (adds and removes fields or entire documents)
      List<String> query(IndexQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever informations, TransactionHandle tx)
      Executes the given query against the index.
      Iterable<RawQuery.Result<String>> query(RawQuery query, KeyInformation.IndexRetriever informations, TransactionHandle tx)
      Executes the given raw query against the index
      void register(String store, String key, KeyInformation information, TransactionHandle tx)
      This method registers a new key for the specified index store with the given data type.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing.IndexInformation

        supports, supports

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(String store,
            String key,
            KeyInformation information,
            TransactionHandle tx)
              throws StorageException
        This method registers a new key for the specified index store with the given data type. This allows the IndexProvider to prepare the index if necessary. It is expected that this method is first called with each new key to inform the index of the expected type before the key is used in any documents.
        Parameters:
        store - Index store
        key - New key to register
        information - Information on the key to register
        tx - enclosing transaction
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • mutate

        void mutate(Map<String,Map<String,IndexMutation>> mutations,
          KeyInformation.IndexRetriever informations,
          TransactionHandle tx)
            throws StorageException
        Mutates the index (adds and removes fields or entire documents)
        Parameters:
        mutations - Updates to the index. First map contains all the mutations for each store. The inner map contains all changes for each document in an IndexMutation.
        informations - Information on the keys used in the mutation accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
        tx - Enclosing transaction
        Throws:
        StorageException
        See Also:
        IndexMutation

      • query

        List<String> query(IndexQuery query,
                 KeyInformation.IndexRetriever informations,
                 TransactionHandle tx)
                   throws StorageException
        Executes the given query against the index.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to execute
        informations - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
        tx - Enclosing transaction
        Returns:
        The ids of all matching documents
        Throws:
        StorageException
        See Also:
        IndexQuery

      • query

        Iterable<RawQuery.Result<String>> query(RawQuery query,
                                      KeyInformation.IndexRetriever informations,
                                      TransactionHandle tx)
                                        throws StorageException
        Executes the given raw query against the index
        Parameters:
        query - Query to execute
        informations - Information on the keys used in the query accessible through KeyInformation.IndexRetriever.
        tx - Enclosing transaction
        Returns:
        Results objects for all matching documents (i.e. document id and score)
        Throws:
        StorageException
        See Also:
        RawQuery

      • beginTransaction

        TransactionHandle beginTransaction()
                                   throws StorageException
        Returns a transaction handle for a new index transaction.
        Returns:
        New Transaction Handle
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • close

        void close()
           throws StorageException
        Closes the index
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • clearStorage

        void clearStorage()
                  throws StorageException
        Clears the index and removes all entries in all stores.
        Throws:
        StorageException
